Name: Dnipro
Description: The largest river in Ukraine and the third largest in Europe (after the Volga River and the Danube River)

Name: Desna
Description: The river in russia and Ukraine, a major left-tributary of the Dnipro

Name: Dnister
Description: The Dniester River flows through Ukraine and Moldova, and is the second longest river in Ukraine.

Name: Rhine
Description: The Rhine River is one of the major rivers of Europe, flowing through Switzerland, Germany, and the Netherlands.

Name: Danube
Description: The Danube River is the second-longest river in Europe, flowing through Central and Eastern Europe.
